    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202578</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Lessons for the Children: Creating a Picture Book about Slavery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionen für die Kinder: Herstellen eines 
Abbildung Buches über Sklaverei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Leçons pour les enfants : Créer un livre 
d'image concernant l'esclavage</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Lições para as crianças: Criando um livro
do retrato sobre o slavery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lezioni per i bambini: Creazione del libro 
dell'immagine su slavery</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθήματα για τα παιδιά: Δημιουργία ενός βιβλίου
εικόνων για τη σκλαβιά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Lecciones para los niños: Crear un libro 
del cuadro acerca de la esclavitud</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Using the slave narratives of Harriet Jacobs and Ellen Craft made available through the Documenting the American South on-line collection, students will examine the institution of slavery, and create their own picture books.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Sklavendarstellungen von Harriet Jacobs und 
von Ellen Fertigkeit sehend zur Verfügung gestellt durch das 
Dokumentieren der amerikanischen Südonlineansammlung, überprüfen 
Kursteilnehmer die Anstalt der Sklaverei und stellen ihre eigenen 
Abbildung Bücher her.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Décrivant slaves de Harriet Jacobs et de 
métier d'Ellen rendu disponible par la documentation de la collection
en ligne du sud américaine, les étudiants examineront 
l'établissement de l'esclavage, et créent leurs propres livres 
d'image.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Utiliçando as narrativas slave de Harriet Jacobs 
e de ofício de Ellen feito disponível com documentar a coleção em 
linha sul americana, os estudantes examinarão a instituição do 
slavery, e críam seus próprios livros do retrato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le descrizioni slave di Harriet Jacobs e 
del mestiere di Ellen reso disponibile through documentando 
l'accumulazione in linea del sud americana, gli allievi esamineranno 
l'istituzione di slavery e creano i loro propri libri dell'immagine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η χρησιμοποίηση των αφηγημάτων σκλάβων του Harriet 
Jacobs και της Ellen Craft κατέστησε διαθέσιμη μέσω της 
τεκμηρίωσης την αμερικανική νότια on-line συλλογή, οι 
σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν το όργανο της σκλαβιάς, και θα 
δημιουργήσουν τα βιβλία εικόνων τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Viendo las narrativas auxiliares de Harriet Jacobs
y del arte de Ellen hecho disponible con la documentación de la 
colección en línea del sur americana, los estudiantes examinarán a 
institución de la esclavitud, y crean sus propios libros del cuadro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

VERSION:3.0

          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>

          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106700</entry>
